message: I'm proposing a more favorable split this time.  Let's wrap this up quickly.
You had your chance, now it's my turn
Okay, let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to settle this.
Your 50/50 split is too late, I want more
This is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a reasonable compromise - take it before inflation hurts us both more.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous
This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it - we both lose if this goes on any longer.
